page.title: 02LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content:
Melton Mowbray is served by two councils:Melton Borough Council & Leicestershire County Council.
Melton Mowbray also has an organisation called the Town Estate which is run by a number of feoffes & two town wardens.Before local government the Town Estate was a form of self-government for the town.It provides an estate of lands & properties which are held in trust for all the people living in Melton Mowbray.
The Town Estate owns the parks & sports grounds in the town.
A town meeting is held each year in October to elect the new town wardens.
